definition: A type of oil derived from the inner part of a fruit, commonly used in culinary applications and known for its distinct flavor and nutritional properties.

examples.english: Apple seed oil is a high-quality cooking oil.

examples.german: Apfelkernöl wird aus den Kernen der Äpfel gewonnen.
examples.english: Apple seed oil is extracted from the seeds of apples.

examples.german: Apfelkernöl hat einen milden Geschmack nach Äpfeln.
examples.english: Apple seed oil has a mild apple flavor.

examples.german: Apfelkernöl eignet sich gut zum Verfeinern von Salaten.
examples.english: Apple seed oil is suitable for enhancing salads.
Apple seed oil contains many healthy fatty acids.
